basics.name: Eric Zhou
basics.label: Graduate
basics.summary: I studied for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences and the Creative Computational Media (CCM) Certificate at the University of Hawai`i. I graduated in Fall 2025.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship automatically awarded to first-year, degree-seeking students who enroll at UH MƒÅnoa in the semester following the completion of their high school diploma and have demonstrated outstanding academic achievement.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai`i public school.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction if they: (1) earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade (C/NC courses do not count), and (2) do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.
